title: WE SET OUT TO UNDERSTAND PEOPLE BETTER
text: The internet is the largest reflection of Human Behaviour.
text1: We, understand that each of these digital fragments is meaningless without human context.
text2: Anthropologists, semioticians and designers work together with engineers, data scientists and mathematicians.
text3: With so many different pairs of eyes, we research the internet as a dynamic reflection of the world. It allows us to understand people and culture at a scale never before possible.

section.title: Why Antd?
section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

section.title: Why styled-components?
section.content: Styled Components gives you total control over your components.
